attributes.action: That Ofcom be replaced by some other organisation in dealing with media issues.
attributes.additional_details: Since a religious ethos was last prevalent in our nation in the 1950's there has been a ten-fold increase in crimes and enormous increases in social problems. A study of 88 civilisations by Professor J.D. Unwin from Cambridge University in the 1940's showed the following: whenever there was pre-marital sex, infidelity, wide-spread promiscuity and same-sex relationships, the whole civilisation was wiped out within 3 generations - with no exceptions. There are other similar studies.
attributes.background: Ofcom are allowing all kinds of immoral, degrading gratuitous sexual content to be shown on our TV screens. The sexual revolution has been a total disaster for our nation. The criteria for TV standards should be based according to moral and spiritual values in line with our Judeo/Christian heritage.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to replace Ofcom.
